# Portfolio Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Professional portfolio website for Cl√©ment Garreau built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, React Router, and Lucide React icons.

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- React Router DOM
- Lucide React (icons)

## Features
- 6 main sections: Home, About, Skills, Projects, Experience, Contact
- Fixed sidebar navigation with smooth scrolling
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- Animations and transitions
- Contact form with validation
- GitHub Pages deployment ready

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Follow Tailwind utility-first approach
- Ensure accessibility standards
- Optimize for performance

## Deployment
Configured for GitHub Pages deployment with gh-pages package.

## Local Setup
1. Clone the repository: `git clone https://github.com/yourusername/portfolio.git`
2. Navigate to the project directory: `cd portfolio`
3. Install dependencies: `npm install`
4. Start the development server: `npm run dev`
5. Open your browser and go to `http://localhost:3000`

## Build
To create a production build, run `npm run build`. The output will be in the `dist` folder.

## Troubleshooting
- For any issues, check the browser console for errors.
- Ensure all dependencies are correctly installed.
- Refer to the documentation of the respective technologies for guidance.
